description: Information about the episodes related to a charge line.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAST_UPDT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the bundled episode was updated on this charge line.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The bundled episode whose link is defined on this line

columns.name: LINK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This indicates whether this episode is linked to the universal charge line.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Link


Unlink

columns.name: LINK_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether it's a user-override or something different that set the link.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: LINK_USER_ID
columns.description: Indicates the user who set the episode status for theï¿½charge line.
